entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
